name: Invaded Privacy
description:
Game created for the Game Jam:  #LOWREZJAM 2017. And wow. It's been a whiiiile since I worked on such a game.

As for the game, long story short, invading monsters make the mistake on barging in Pretty's (yes. that's her name...) room. While she came out of the shower. And as such, she wants payback!

It's a simple platform shooter with the following features:

-4 Levels

-4 Bosses

-3 Minibosses

-Hi-Score system (And if you quit the game while having the highest score, it'll be automatically saved)

-And a few unrelated details I won't bring up til' ya try out the game! Enjoy!
